title: Low pop raw Piedmont 350s - yes you read that right!
author: t206kid

posts.post_title: Low pop raw Piedmont 350s - yes you read that right!
posts.post_content:
Selling the following cards, all of which are scarce with Piedmont 350 backs.   

For context, the Elite 11, a group of cards also with very scarce Piedmont 350 backs will sell for hundreds of dollars apiece.  Per the chart below (using PSA pops), the below cards have generally similar pops to the Elite 11.  

It's taken about 2 years to assemble this nearly complete binder page.  I see A LOT of raw cards and these are not easy to find.

If all that means nothing to you, then selling some nice raw commons :)

The pictures are as a binder page, so backs are flipped.  E.g., Conroy is the backstamp.  Free shipping.  Prices for FF.

Donovans: Left SOLD; Middle (recolored) $50; Right SOLD
Bergen batting SOLD
Leach portrait SOLD
McQuillan fielding: Left SOLD; Right $50
Konetchy glove up: BOTH SOLD
Conroy fielding: $85 (00209 backstamp)
Pastorius: $125
McIntyre: SOLD
Covaleski: Left (ugly back) $50; Right (clean back) $85
